notes: Recently renovated apartment in excellent condition with modern finishes including recessed lighting, split AC units, zebra blinds, leather sofa, wall-mounted TV, and clean white tile flooring. Being on the top floor (4F/4F) of a low-rise building with no elevator is a significant concern for carrying a baby and stroller up stairs daily. The apartment appears very clean and baby-safe with no visible balcony hazards, smooth rounded furniture, and good natural light from multiple windows, though only the living room and bedroom are shown â€” kitchen and bathroom are not visible.
